;----------------------------
; Start of FAR Section
;----------------------------
; Start of FAR3 Section (FAR2 below)
; Added by memo on 08/28/2012
; last edited by memo on 09/09/2012
;
; FAR and wide radius road curves stability code
;
; straight FAR continuation
0x5f090000,2,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,2,0,0x5f090000,0,0
0x5f090000,2,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,2,0,0x5f090000,0,0
0x5f090000,0,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,0,1,0x5f090000,2,1
0x5f090000,0,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,0,1,0x5f090000,2,1
0x5f090000,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090000,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090000,2,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f090000,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
0x5f090000,2,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f090000,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090100,0,0,0x5f090200,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090100,2,1,0x5f090200,2,1
; prevent from continuing too far
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x5f090100,2,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;
; orthogonal to FAR curve continuation
0x5f090400,0,0,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090400,0,0,0x5f090100,0,0
0x5f090400,2,1,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090400,2,1,0x5f090100,2,1
;
; FAR to diagonal curve continuation
0x5f090500,3,0,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090500,3,0,0x5f090600,3,0
0x5f090500,1,1,0x00000300,3,0=0x5f090500,1,1,0x5f090600,1,1
0x5f090600,3,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090600,3,0,0x5f090700,3,0
0x5f090600,1,1,0x00000300,1,0=0x5f090600,1,1,0x5f090700,1,1
0x5f090600,0,0,0x00000300,0,0=0x5f090600,0,0,0x5f090800,0,0
0x5f090600,2,1,0x00000300,2,0=0x5f090600,2,1,0x5f090800,2,1
0x5f090700,0,0,0x00004b00,0,0=0x5f090700,0,0,0x5f090900,0,0
0x5f090700,0,0,0x00004b00,2,0=0x5f090700,0,0,0x5f090900,0,0
0x5f090700,2,1,0x00004b00,0,0=0x5f090700,2,1,0x5f090900,2,1
0x5f090700,2,1,0x00004b00,2,0=0x5f090700,2,1,0x5f090900,2,1
0x5f090800,2,0,0x00000300,2,0=0x5f090800,2,0,0x5f090600,2,0
0x5f090800,0,1,0x00000300,0,0=0x5f090800,0,1,0x5f090600,0,1
0x5f090600,1,0,0x00000200,2,1=0x5f090600,1,0,0x5f090500,1,0
0x5f090600,3,1,0x00000200,0,0=0x5f090600,3,1,0x5f090500,3,1
0x5f090800,3,0,0x5f090000,0,1=0x5f090800,3,0,0x5f090900,3,0
0x5f090800,1,1,0x5f090000,2,0=0x5f090800,1,1,0x5f090900,1,1
;
0x5f090600,3,0,0x5f090200,2,1=0x5f090600,3,0,0x5f090700,3,0
0x5f090600,1,1,0x5f090200,0,0=0x5f090600,1,1,0x5f090700,1,1
;
; FAR x FAR +-intersection stability (vs roundabout)

0x5f091a00,0,1,0x5f06ba00,2,0=0x5f091a00,0,1,0x5f091800,0,1

; FAR x FAR T-intersection

; End of FAR3 Section
;---------------------------
;
;
;----------------------------
; Start of FAR2 Section / FA2R Section / FA-2 Road Section / HDR Section
; Added by memo on 09/03/2012
; last edited by memo on 09/09/2012
;
; FAR2 short curve (orthogonal to FA2)

; End of FAR2 Section
;---------------------------
; End of FAR Section
;---------------------------
;
;
;----------------------------
; Start of FAOWR Section
; Added by memo on 08/28/2012
;
; FAOWR and wide radius road curves stability code
;
; straight FAOWR continuation
0x5f990000,2,0,0x09004b00,1,0=0x5f990000,2,0,0x5f990000,0,0
0x5f990000,2,0,0x09004b00,3,0=0x5f990000,2,0,0x5f990000,0,0

;----------------------------
; Start of FA Street 2 Section
; Added by Tarkus 08/14/2022
; based on Road equivalent by memo from 09/09/2012
;
; FA2 short curve (orthogonal to FA2)
0x05004b00,1,0,0x5F588000,0,0=0x5F588200,0,0,0x5F588300,0,0

0x5F588000,2,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F588300,2,0,0x5F588200,2,0
0x5F588000,0,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F588300,0,1,0x5F588200,0,1
0x5F588000,0,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F588300,0,1,0x5F588200,0,1
;added for stability
0x05004b00,1,0,0x5F588300,0,0=0x5F588200,0,0,0x5F588300,0,0
0x5F588200,0,0,0x5F588000,0,0=0x5F588200,0,0,0x5F588300,0,0
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5F588300,0,0=0x5F588200,0,0,0x5F588300,0,0
0x05004b00,1,0,0x5F588300,2,1=0x5F588200,2,1,0x5F588300,2,1
0x5F588200,2,1,0x5F588000,2,1=0x5F588200,2,1,0x5F588300,2,1
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5F588300,2,1=0x5F588200,2,1,0x5F588300,2,1
; auto continuation of straight FAR2 and short curve
0x5F588100,3,0,0x05004b00,0,0=0x5F588100,3,0,0x5F588300,1,0
0x5F588100,3,0,0x05004b00,2,0=0x5F588100,3,0,0x5F588300,1,0
0x5F588100,1,1,0x05004b00,0,0=0x5F588100,1,1,0x5F588300,3,1
0x5F588100,1,1,0x05004b00,2,0=0x5F588100,1,1,0x5F588300,3,1
0x5F588300,0,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588300,0,0,0x5F588100,0,0
0x5F588300,2,1,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588300,2,1,0x5F588100,2,1
0x5F588100,3,0,0x5F588200,3,0=0x5F588100,3,0,0x5F588000,1,0
0x5F588100,1,1,0x5F588200,1,1=0x5F588100,1,1,0x5F588000,3,1
0x5F588000,0,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588000,0,0,0x5F588100,0,0
0x5F588000,2,1,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588000,2,1,0x5F588100,2,1
0x5F588000,2,0,0x5F588300,0,0=0x5F588000,2,0,0x5F588000,0,0
0x5F588000,0,1,0x5F588300,2,1=0x5F588000,0,1,0x5F588000,2,1
;
; continuation of straight FA2
0x5F588200,2,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588000,0,0,0x5F588100,0,0
0x5F588200,0,1,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F588000,2,1,0x5F588100,2,1
0x5F588000,2,0,0x5F588300,0,0=0x5F588000,2,0,0x5F588000,0,0
0x5F588000,0,1,0x5F588300,2,1=0x5F588000,0,1,0x5F588000,2,1
;
; FA2 to FA3 curve
0x5F580000,2,0,0x5F588000,0,0=0x5F588600,0,0,0x5F588700,0,0
0x5F580000,0,1,0x5F588000,2,1=0x5F588600,2,1,0x5F588700,2,1
;added for stability
0x5F580000,2,0,0x5F588700,0,0=0x5F588600,0,0,0x5F588700,0,0
0x5F588600,0,0,0x5F588000,0,0=0x5F588600,0,0,0x5F588700,0,0
0x5F580000,0,1,0x5F588700,2,1=0x5F588600,2,1,0x5F588700,2,1
0x5F588600,2,1,0x5F588000,2,1=0x5F588600,2,1,0x5F588700,2,1
;
; FA3 long curve stability (due to FA2 code)
0x5F581300,2,0,0x5F588100,0,0=0x5F581300,2,0,0x5F581100,2,0
0x5F581300,0,1,0x5F588100,2,1=0x5F581300,0,1,0x5F581100,0,1
0x5F580f00,0,0,0x5F588000,0,0=0x5F580f00,0,0,0x5F581000,0,0
0x5F580f00,2,1,0x5F588000,2,1=0x5F580f00,2,1,0x5F581000,2,1
;
; FA2 ending in orthogonal street T-intersection
0x5F588000,2,0,0x05005700,2,0=0x5F588000,2,0,0x5F589300,0,0
0x5F588000,0,1,0x05005700,2,0=0x5F588000,0,1,0x5F589300,2,1
; End of FA2 Street Section
;---------------------------

; Start of FA Street 3 Section
; Added by Tarkus 08/14/2022
; based on Road equivalent by memo from 09/09/2012
;
; FAR and wide radius street curves stability code
;
; straight FAR continuation
;0x5F580000,2,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580000,2,0,0x5F580000,0,0
;0x5F580000,2,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580000,2,0,0x5F580000,0,0
;0x5F580000,0,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580000,0,1,0x5F580000,2,1
;0x5F580000,0,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580000,0,1,0x5F580000,2,1
;0x5F580000,0,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580000,0,0,0x5F580100,0,0
;0x5F580000,0,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580000,0,0,0x5F580100,0,0
;0x5F580000,2,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580000,2,1,0x5F580100,2,1
;0x5F580000,2,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580000,2,1,0x5F580100,2,1
;0x5F580100,0,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F580100,0,0,0x5F580200,0,0
;0x5F580100,2,1,0x05000300,1,0=0x5F580100,2,1,0x5F580200,2,1
; prevent from continuing too far
;0x5F580100,0,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x5F580100,0,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x5F580100,2,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x5F580100,2,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;
; orthogonal to FAR curve continuation
0x5F580400,0,0,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,0,0,0x5F580100,0,0
0x5F580400,2,1,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,2,1,0x5F580100,2,1
;
0x5F580000,2,0,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,2,0,0x5F580300,2,0
0x5F580000,0,1,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1

0x5F580000,0,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1

0x5F580000,0,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1
;
0x5F580400,2,0,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,2,0,0x5F580300,2,0
0x5F580400,0,1,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1
0x5F580400,2,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580400,2,0,0x5F580300,2,0
0x5F580400,0,1,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1
0x5F580400,2,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580400,2,0,0x5F580300,2,0
0x5F580400,0,1,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5F580400,0,1,0x5F580300,0,1
;
; FAR to diagonal curve continuation
0x5F580500,3,0,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580500,3,0,0x5F580600,3,0
0x5F580500,1,1,0x05000300,3,0=0x5F580500,1,1,0x5F580600,1,1
